{"id":1483863288,"question_id":3335,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1734710008,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1483863288/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Operations to Write the Letter Y on a Grid","memory":"41.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumOperationsToWriteY(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {//grid[r][c] is 0, 1, or 2.\n        int ret = INT_MAX;\n        for(int y=0; y<=2; y++) {\n            for(int notY=0; notY<=2; notY++) {\n                if(y==notY)\n                    continue;\n                ret = min(ret, getOperationsCount(grid, y, notY));               \n            }\n        }\n        return ret;       \n    }\n    int getOperationsCount(vector<vector<int>>& grid, int y, int notY) {\n        int ret = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<grid.size(); i++) {\n            for(int j=0; j<grid[0].size(); j++) {\n                if(belongY(grid, i, j)) {\n                    if( grid[i][j]!=y)\n                        ret++;\n                } else {\n                    if( grid[i][j]!=notY)\n                        ret++;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ret;\n    }\n    bool belongY(vector<vector<int>>& grid, int i, int j) {\n        int n = grid.size();\n        if(i<=n/2 &&(i==j || i+j == n-1) || i>n/2 && j==n/2)\n            return true;\n        else\n            return false;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-operations-to-write-the-letter-y-on-a-grid","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
